books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: When a brutal murder threatens the domestic happiness of the San Francisco police detective Lindsay Boxer, she turns for help to the Women’s Murder Club.
books.name: 15TH AFFAIR

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: A woman who has barely been beyond her English village finds herself while caring for a wealthy, embittered quadriplegic.
books.name: ME BEFORE YOU

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: In a sequel to “Memory Man,” Amos Decker, a detective with an extraordinary memory, investigates the case of a convicted killer who wins a last-minute reprieve.
books.name: THE LAST MILE

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Four young women share a Hell’s Kitchen loft.
books.name: THE APARTMENT

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Lucas Davenport, who has left the Minnesota Bureau of Criminal Apprehension, is in Iowa trying to foil a plot to assassinate a Hillary Clinton-like candidate. The 26th Lucas Davenport thriller.
books.name: EXTREME PREY

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A woman is haunted by her father’s crimes as she tries to pursue love and her work as a photographer.
books.name: THE OBSESSION

books.author: by Claudia Gray
books.description: Leia Organa is urged to become First Senator of the New Republic.
books.name: STAR WARS: BLOODLINE

books.author: by Mary Balogh
books.description: A widower duke considers couplehood again when he meets a beguiling music teacher.
books.name: ONLY BELOVED

books.author: by Cynthia D'Aprix Sweeney
books.description: Siblings in a dysfunctional New York family must grapple with a reduced inheritance.
books.name: THE NEST

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Lauren Blakely
books.description: The sister of an accomplished seducer's best friend asks him to teach her everything he knows about how to attract a man.
books.name: MISTER O

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Richard Russo
books.description: We’re back in North Bath, N.Y., in a sequel to “Nobody’s Fool.”
books.name: EVERYBODY'S FOOL

books.author: by Ace Atkins
books.description: Spenser is back, leaving a trail of antagonism as he investigates a series of suspicious Boston fires.
books.name: ROBERT B. PARKER'S SLOW BURN

books.author: by Maya Banks
books.description: Drake tries to win back Evangeline's affections, but can she trust him enough to give him a second chance?
books.name: DOMINATED
